description: Restructure slides from flat markdown files to folder-based structure with index.md and assets

key_decisions.decision: Architecture should be permissive, not prescriptive
key_decisions.rationale: User wants to 'set the stage' for future complexity without knowing exact implementation yet. Structure should allow flexibility.
Allows easy scripting for building top-level index.md - same ordering logic works
React-style convention where index is the main file for a folder. Fallback to slide.md if naming conflicts arise.
No boilerplate for simple slides. Complexity expands organically by adding folders/components as needed.
Use ./assets/image.png from index.md - keeps vertical slice self-contained. Avoids needing to reference public/ folder. Build system handles resolution.
Update all slides, build script, templates, and Slidev skill together. Complete migration, not gradual adoption.
